title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Defense Institution Reform Initiative

description.narrative: Tunisia - Tunisian Armed Force Human Resource Management #4. Support the Navys two highest priority efforts: The RMACU.S.-provided coastal radars, and RCMan effort to establish new commando capabilities, and a center of excellence to increase the Navys ability to respond to threats, particularly in performance of new missions. Create better understanding of the current state of implementation of the government-wide shift to Management Based on Objectives (MBO), as directed by the Ministry of Finance (MoF);.

description.narrative: This program funds equipment and training with the intent of enhancing the Tunisian Army's ability to operate in an IED threat environment and bolstering their ability to execute operations against regional terrorists and VEOs.
